name: Cat Jump (itch) (LITTERBOX)
description:
To emulate press z (for gameboy press B)

Controls
Left/Down/Right/Up - Arrow keys
Jump - Z (for gameboy press B)
Run    - X (for gameboy press A)
Menu-Enter (gameboy press start)
Music-Shift   (gameboy press select)
Information
This is a video game created for the gameboy handheld system. It started as a platformer presentation  and grew into a variety of modes in over half a year. Lots of fun was had in the process of creating this game and every level was preserved without dispose. Enjoy
